product_name: Seattle Sports Solar Camp Shower - 5 Gallon - Special Buy
long_description: Fill the 5-gal. Seattle Sports Solar Camp Shower with water, add some sunshine, and you can enjoy a warm shower right at your campsite. PVC-free black PEVA water reservoir is heavy duty yet lightweight for easy packing; black color absorbs heat to warm water in just a few hours. 5-gal. capacity bag provides enough water for a few quick showers. Tear-drop shape concentrates the water flow to the shower nozzle. Push-pull valve on hose is easy to use, allowing you to turn water off quickly. Sturdy plastic handle offers convenient toting and durability; hanging strap is adjustable. Bag measures 26.5 x 17.5 in. Special buy.
short_description: Fill the 5-gal. Seattle Sports Solar Camp Shower with water, add some sunshine, and you can enjoy a warm shower right at your campsite.
